channel.title: So stupid
channel.description: I did every tutorial on how to start a server. But how do I get it so that people can come and play on it without having to go on local connection? I did u torrent no-ip and they don't work. Do I have to change something on my source? I use Linksys for my router if that does anything different... I dunno what to do now... :(

Lol it took me 3 years to see I put in 001 instead of 102…

item.title: So stupid
item.dc:creator: @Lust.BS Lust.BS
item.description:
@Lust.BS wrote:

[ul][li]Make sure your internet’s turned on (RSPS’s work without the internet)[/li]
[li]Make sure you got the No-IP set up correctly and are giving the correct IP address out on advertisement[/li]
[li]Make sure you’re giving the correct port out - it may be that your client and server are not compatible[/ul]

If all else fails, start from scratch and make sure you’re doing everything right. Once you’ve done it once it’s easy peasey lemon squeezy.
Best tutorial to use, start to finish: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,342685.0.html

Read full topic
